price: Oni koji se suprotstavljaju Allahu i Poslaniku Njegovu bit će, sigurno, među onim najponiženijim.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُحَآدُّونَ ٱللَّهَ وَرَسُولَهُۥٓ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ فِي ٱلۡأَذَلِّينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna yuḥāddūna al-laha warasūlahu ulāika fī al-adhalīna
